title: Tsub
author: Tsub
content: Anyone running immersion cooled Z15's?I am having a cooling problem and don't have a point of reference.

comments.author: phoenix778899
comments.body: I also dealt with this topic. I would like to share my immersion cooling system with you and the world. Mining machines heat my bath water and heat my house.https://photos.google.com/share/AF1QipNfqORAShBm_oSvJ-I_g5RqMcAajJ6iJNTcQn3PEaJB3vOT7_qvTtfMkY05Kuxpcg?key=by02ZUlfX3ZEZnpESEJoWW5VWkJVRmFfdnJTbVVB

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Tsub on July 23, 2022, 02:02:50 AMAnyone running immersion cooled Z15's?I am having a cooling problem and don't have a point of reference.It would be great to hear more about the details of your setup and the equipment used.  That may also help diagnose the issue you're having.  I'd also love to see pictures of your setup.  There aren't too many people using immersion cooling although it is somewhat the holy grail of mining.  The more information, pictures, and knowledge about available hardware would be appreciated.

comments.author: phoenix778899
comments.created_time: August 30, 2022, 06:01:29 PMLast edit: August 30, 2022, 06:41:13 PM by phoenix778899
comments.body: were you able to see shared pictures? I also attached the other elements of the system in the album. I use a Hiveos system.My system, 1 antminer s9 (2 hash board low profile) and 5 antminer L3+ miner (normal mod). The consumption of the farm is 3.577 KW/h.The heat energy produced by the farm is 357 kw. (Calculation is simple: 3.577 KW/h electricity = 357 kw heat energy) The system contains 210 liters of transformer oil. The power supplies are located separately. Only the hash boards and the control board are in the oil. I placed the machines vertically in a barrel.https://photos.google.com/share/AF1QipOkxPgyVHBzTStVsNn5BAMt2GCcS-Wtbeu3xCOknYuWBJjVimalxby7tN3hd65pcQ?key=YzRyVmUzTVhXaEMxbWt5UzUzclNzaFR0SUtTeHZn

comments.author: arielbit
comments.body: heaters are 3k-10kw, depending if they are just shower heaters or multi point heaters.3-10kw, that is a huge "electrical space for mining"if you maxed out your electrical space with mining, imagine every time you take a hot shower you trip your breaker LOL.this heating project is a must is you can do it in a non-warehouse mining environment.you can even make a sauna room with heating

comments.author: phoenix778899
comments.body: mining works 0-24. system first heats bath water and then the heat exchangers. I have a total of 172 liters of hot water with which I can take a shower. if I'm cold, the house thermostat turns on the secondary circulation pump and heats the house. What I created: no wood or gas heating. I don't pollute the air. At the moment, I buy electricity from the electricity supplier, but in 1-2 years, the mining will be powered by solar panels and I will protect the land 100%. I am ending the era of crypto mining polluting the environment. I share it with the world so that they can see and know how to use the abundant heat energy that the machines provide. Energy is not lost, it is only transformed and every miner can use the transformed energy.

comments.author: arielbit
comments.body: Quote from: phoenix778899 on August 31, 2022, 03:13:34 PMmining works 0-24. system first heats bath water and then the heat exchangers. I have a total of 172 liters of hot water with which I can take a shower. if I'm cold, the house thermostat turns on the secondary circulation pump and heats the house. What I created: no wood or gas heating. I don't pollute the air. At the moment, I buy electricity from the electricity supplier, but in 1-2 years, the mining will be powered by solar panels and I will protect the land 100%. I am ending the era of crypto mining polluting the environment. I share it with the world so that they can see and know how to use the abundant heat energy that the machines provide. Energy is not lost, it is only transformed and every miner can use the transformed energy. If you can increase the liters of hot water, more miners. You will have a lot more hot water.Hot water + volcanic sulphur = onsen.Onsen are a very good to health and skin.Search the internet and you'll see that in japan they have packets, sachets of those powders, they are for home or travel use so that you can put them in your bath tub.Now if you can source those locally and make onsen baths, that is from home/personal use to business.You'll earn from mining and you'll earn from onsen.If onsens make you $$$$ you won't have to worry about bear markets.

comments.author: phoenix778899
comments.body: very good idea. I found a bigger idea. I will build this system on a large scale in the future and I want to supply a city with hot water. co2 free city by crypto miners. let the mining companies realize that the future of the district heating service is in their hands.

comments.author: arielbit
comments.body: Quote from: phoenix778899 on August 31, 2022, 04:50:55 PMvery good idea. I found a bigger idea. I will build this system on a large scale in the future and I want to supply a city with hot water. co2 free city by crypto miners. let the mining companies realize that the future of the district heating service is in their hands.    Before going full scale city, start with the neighborhood.There are countries that have their electricity bills skyrocket, a neighborhood crypto mining to heat their homes might be a money saver.It may not be profitable but cutting cost by some significant enough %  is better than paying in full.Now, if you are making money from mining then you can compete with the price of heating services.Feasibility study and small scale first hehe.
